synopsis.text: Qi Ri Mai, Yinghuo Guitu, and a host of other captivating tales await you in the 'Capsule Project,' a unique initiative by Bilibili to bolster China's animation industry. This project brings together professional teams from diverse industries to craft an original short animation series centered around 'extreme emotions.' Prepare to be enthralled by a myriad of perspectives and styles, as each story unfolds in a mesmerizing and emotionally charged narrative. From the fantastical Liushou Tonghua to the thought-provoking Shuangmian, and the thrilling Zhongji Tiyan, this collection promises an extraordinary journey through a spectrum of emotions. Also featuring Banzhang Ai Xue, Yi Zheng, Chenguang Qiaqia Hao, G-MAN: Taikong De Qi Xia, Fanqie Canting, and Jie, this series is a testament to the power of storytelling and the magic of animation.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
